title: ARCS Motivation-Based Nursing Leadership Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theories and practical experience, foundational leadership competencies
context.additional_context: Customized education for nursing managers/leaders within corporations to strengthen their roles, operated as a blended model (online for theory + offline for practice/workshops)

learning_goals: Design three or more nursing education scenarios by applying the ARCS model (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction)
Propose strategies to improve team members' academic self-efficacy by 20% or more using motivational techniques
Analyze factors influencing learning attitudes in blended environments and develop improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
